{{fr-noun|f|-|head=[[navigation]] [[à l'estime]]}}

# [[dead reckoning]] {{gloss|method of estimating the position of a ship or aircraft by applying estimates of the distance and direction travelled from a previously known position}}
types.html:
navigation à l'estime f (uncountable)

  1. dead reckoning (method of estimating the position of a ship or aircraft by applying estimates of the distance and direction travelled from a previously known position)

title: navigation à l'estime
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /na.vi.ɡa.sjɔ̃ a l‿ɛs.tim/
